description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'NotesList' which displays a list of notes using NoteCard components, handles empty state display, and emits selection and deletion events to parent components.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders a list of notes, with support for empty state, selection, and deletion actions.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles the selection of a note and emits a 'select' event to the parent component.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles the deletion of a note and emits a 'delete' event to the parent component.

methods.name: calcX
methods.description: Calculates the X position for a note based on its index, arranging notes in two columns.

methods.name: calcY
methods.description: Calculates the Y position for a note based on its index, arranging notes in rows.

methods.name: $onSelect
methods.description: Wrapper method to handle select event from NoteCard component.

methods.name: $onDelete
methods.description: Wrapper method to handle delete event from NoteCard component.

methods.name: $calcX
methods.description: Wrapper for calcX, used in template bindings.

methods.name: $calcY
methods.description: Wrapper for calcY, used in template bindings.
